events.message: I filed a claim today after my car was hit by another vehicle at the intersection last night.
The claim has been categorized as an auto accident involving a collision and vehicle damage.
An agent has been assigned to manage and assist with the details of your car accident claim.
We have received and acknowledged your auto accident claim and are beginning the review process.
Please submit your vehicle registration, police report, and photos from the collision scene to proceed.
All requested documents, including police report and damage photos, have been submitted successfully.
The investigation into the auto accident claim has officially begun and experts are reviewing the case.
Investigation has concluded confirming liability and extent of the damage to your vehicle.
We have prepared a proposed settlement amount to cover repairs and losses stemming from your car accident.
You have provided feedback indicating satisfaction with the proposed settlement and support throughout this process.
Your auto accident claim has been formally approved and will proceed to payment issuance soon.
The settlement payment for your vehicle damages was issued today and should arrive shortly.
Your claim is now officially closed, and we appreciate your cooperation throughout the process.
The auto accident claim records have been securely archived for future reference if needed.
